qas.question: What political speaches are delivered in English and Spanish?

answers.text: The State of the Union Addresses and other presidential speeches are translated to Spanish

qas.question: Was this always the case in American political addresses?

answers.text: following the precedent set by the Bill Clinton administration. Official Spanish translations are available at WhiteHouse.gov.

qas.question: Does Washington (government) operate in both languages (bilingual-Spanish?)

answers.text: politicians fluent in Spanish-speak in Spanish to Hispanic majority constituencies

qas.question: If someone is not bilingual and only speaks Spanish, how do they learn about current events?

answers.text: There are 500 Spanish newspapers, 152 magazines, and 205 publishers in the United States; magazine and local television

qas.question: Is the Hispanic population relevant to the American media?

answers.text: local television advertising expenditures for the Hispanic market have increased much from 1999 to 2003, with growth of 58 percent and 43 percent, respectively.
